name: Space Bugs Attack the Farm!
description:
Space Bugs are attacking the Farm!!!

Use your quick wits and trusty scythe to bat them away and harvest your berry bush!

Made (very casually) for Ludum Dare 52 - Harvest!

== Techniques ==

Your trusty scythe is stronger if you hit a bug with just the blade!!

If you DASH and SLICE at the SAME TIME it will do DOUBLE DAMAGE!!!

== Controls ==

WASD - Movement

Space - Dash (Towards Mouse)

Left Click - Attack (Towards Mouse)

ESC/Enter - Enter Shop/Pause

== Credits ==

Kory - Programming, Design, Bad Art

Jack - Music

Brooklyn - Good Art

Pierce - Voice Acting
